software_name: Intel Integrated Performance Primitives (Intel IPP) for Intel 64
comprehensive_overview: The Intel Integrated Performance Primitives (Intel IPP) is a library of functions for multimedia, data processing, and communication applications which are developed to enable developers to deliver more reliable, scalable, and efficient applications.
core_features: Optimized functions for multimedia, data processing, and communication applications
Support for various data types and platforms including Intel 64 architecture
Parallel processing capabilities for improved performance
Integration with popular development environments and compilers
